name: Eiffel Tower
address: Champ de Mars, 5 Avenue Anatole France, 75007 Paris, France
description: Iconic tower in Paris, offering panoramic views of the city from its observation decks.
guide: Be sure to buy tickets in advance to skip the long lines. The best views are from the top observation deck, but be prepared for crowds.

name: Palace of Versailles
description: Grand palace and gardens built for King Louis XIV, with opulent decor, fountains, and manicured lawns.
guide: Get there early to avoid crowds and give yourself enough time to see all the highlights, including the Hall of Mirrors and the gardens.
perks: Beautiful gardens with fountains and statues
Audio guide available in multiple languages

name: Mont Saint-Michel
description: A rocky island topped by a medieval monastery, accessible by a causeway at low tide.
guide: Check the tide schedule before you go, as the causeway can be submerged at high tide. Wear comfortable shoes for climbing the steep steps to the top.
perks: Stunning views of the coast and surrounding countryside
Onsite restaurants and shops selling local specialties

name: Chateau de Chambord
description: Grand Renaissance-style castle built in the 16th century, with ornate architecture and extensive gardens.
guide: Take a guided tour to learn more about the history and architecture of the castle, and don't miss the rooftop terrace for great views.
perks: Audio guide available in multiple languages

name: Cote d'Azur
description: Stunning coastline with azure waters and picturesque towns, including Nice, Cannes, and Saint-Tropez.
guide: Take a drive along the coast to enjoy the scenery, and be sure to stop in some of the charming towns for local cuisine and shopping.
perks: Explore the beautiful coastal scenery of the French Riviera
Visit glamorous cities and towns like Cannes, Nice, and Monaco
Experience the luxurious lifestyle of the rich and famous
Taste delicious Mediterranean cuisine and local wines
Relax on stunning beaches and swim in crystal-clear waters

name: Tokyo Tower
address: 4 Chome-2-8 Shibakoen, Minato City, Tokyo 105-0011, Japan
description: Iconic tower in Tokyo, offering panoramic views of the city from its observation decks.
guide: Be sure to buy tickets in advance to skip the long lines. The best views are from the top observation deck, but be prepared for crowds.

name: Kyoto Imperial Palace
address: Kyoto Gyoen, Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto, 602-0881, Japan
description: Grand palace in Kyoto, once the residence of the Emperor of Japan, with beautiful gardens and architecture.
guide: Take a guided tour to learn more about the history and architecture of the palace, and don't miss the gardens, which are especially beautiful in cherry blossom season.
perks: Audio guide available in multiple languages

name: Himeji Castle
description: Beautiful castle in Himeji, known for its white exterior and impressive defensive features.
guide: Take a guided tour to learn more about the history and architecture of the castle, and be sure to climb to the top for stunning views of the city and surrounding countryside.
perks: Impressive defensive features and strategic design
Stunning views of Himeji and the countryside
Audio guide available in multiple languages

name: Fushimi Inari Shrine
address: 68 Fukakusa Yabunouchicho, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto, 612-0882, Japan
description: Popular shrine in Kyoto, known for its thousands of torii gates leading up a mountainside trail.
guide: Wear comfortable shoes for climbing the steep trail, and bring water and snacks. The gates are especially beautiful at sunset.
perks: Thousands of torii gates for a unique photo opportunity
Beautiful mountain trail with stunning views

name: Mount Fuji
description: Iconic volcano and mountain in Japan, offering stunning views and hiking opportunities.
guide: Check the weather before you go, as the mountain can be shrouded in clouds. Consider taking the Fujikyu Railway for spectacular views of the mountain.
perks: Stunning views of Japan's highest mountain
Opportunities for hiking and outdoor activities
Chances to explore the surrounding national park
Visits to nearby lakes, shrines, and temples

name: Gyeongbokgung Palace
description: Historic palace in Seoul, known for its grand architecture and beautiful gardens.
guide: Take a guided tour to learn more about the history and significance of the palace. Don't miss the changing of the guard ceremony, which happens multiple times a day.

name: Jeju Island
description: Beautiful island in South Korea, known for its stunning natural beauty and unique culture.
guide: Take a tour to explore the island's many natural attractions, including waterfalls, beaches, and volcanic craters. Don't miss the traditional Jeju houses and cuisine.
perks: Outdoor activities like hiking and beach-going

name: Seoraksan National Park
description: Beautiful national park in South Korea, known for its dramatic mountain scenery and diverse wildlife.
guide: Take a guided hike to the top of Mount Seorak for spectacular views. Don't miss the hot springs and Buddhist temples in the area.
